question: What is Hirrd?
answer: Hirrd is a Job Portal Application that allows companies to post job listings and users to search and apply for jobs. It provides features for both job seekers and employers, with user-friendly interfaces and secure authentication.

question: How do I post a job?
answer: As an employer, you can post a job by navigating to the 'Post Job' section after logging in. Fill in the job details and submit the form to create a new job listing.

question: How can I search for jobs?
answer: Job seekers can search for jobs by keywords, location, category, and other filters using the search bar on the homepage or the dedicated job search page.

question: How do I apply for a job?
answer: To apply for a job, click on the job listing and follow the application instructions provided. You may need to upload your resume and provide additional information.

question: Can I save jobs to apply later?
answer: Yes, you can save job listings by clicking the 'Save Job' button on the job listing. Saved jobs can be accessed from your profile under the 'Saved Jobs' section.

question: How do I track my job applications?
answer: Job seekers can track the status of their applications from the 'Applications' section in their profile. This section provides updates on the progress of each application.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: Click 'Sign Up' and choose 'Job Seeker'. Provide your email, password, and basic details to register.

question: Can I upload multiple resumes?
answer: Yes! Navigate to your profile's 'Documents' section to upload/store multiple resumes/CVs.

question: How do I set up job alerts?
answer: Use the 'Create Alert' option after searching. Receive email notifications when matching jobs are posted.

question: What if I forget my password?
answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. A reset link will be sent to your registered email.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: Go to Account Settings > Delete Account. Note: This action is irreversible.

question: Can I edit my submitted application?
answer: No, once submitted, applications cannot be edited. Contact the employer directly for changes.

question: Are remote jobs available?
answer: Yes! Use the 'Remote' filter in job search or select 'Work From Home' in location preferences.

question: How do I report a suspicious job listing?
answer: Click the 'Report' button on the job details page. Our team will review it within 24 hours.

question: Do you offer interview preparation resources?
answer: Yes! Visit the 'Career Resources' section for guides, templates, and tips.

question: How do I hide my profile from employers?
answer: Enable 'Private Mode' in Profile Settings. Employers won't see your profile in searches.

question: How do employers register?
answer: Click 'Employer Sign Up', verify your company email, and complete the organization profile.

question: Is there a fee to post jobs?
answer: Basic listings are free. Premium posts with enhanced visibility start at $XX/month.

question: Can I edit a published job listing?
answer: Yes! Go to 'Manage Jobs' in your dashboard and click 'Edit' on any active listing.

question: How do I view applicant details?
answer: Access the 'Applications' tab in your employer dashboard. Click any candidate to see their full profile.

question: Can I extend application deadlines?
answer: Yes. Edit the job listing and update the 'Apply By' date before the original deadline expires.

question: How do I contact applicants?
answer: Use the built-in messaging system in the Applications section to communicate securely.

question: What file formats can candidates upload?
answer: We support PDF, DOCX, and TXT files (max 5MB size).

question: Which browsers are supported?
answer: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge (latest versions). Enable JavaScript for optimal performance.

question: Is there a mobile app?
answer: Not yet, but our website is fully mobile-responsive. App development is planned for 2024.

question: How is my data protected?
answer: We use SSL encryption, regular security audits, and comply with GDPR regulations.

question: Why am I not receiving emails?
answer: Check spam/junk folders. Whitelist @hirrd.com in your email client. Contact support if issues persist.

question: Can I disable notifications?
answer: Yes. Customize email/SMS alerts in Notification Preferences under Account Settings.

question: How do I change my email address?
answer: Go to Profile > Contact Information. A verification link will be sent to your new email.

question: Are there accessibility features?
answer: Yes! Enable screen reader mode and high-contrast theme in Accessibility Settings.

question: How do I subscribe to newsletters?
answer: Opt-in during registration or manage preferences in Account Settings > Communications.

question: Can I switch between job seeker/employer accounts?
answer: Yes! Use the 'Switch Role' dropdown in your profile (requires separate verification for employer features).
